attributes.action: No income tax to be paid during pre-Brexit finalisation parliamentary prorogue
attributes.background: In the event that the government ignore the concerns of the people raised in the petition to stop the foolish pre-Brexit suspension of government, I petition that  the hardworking public of this great nation have to pay zero income tax during the suspension while the government shirks its duty

rejection.details: Government is not suspended during a prorogation of Parliament, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
